description: Icon is the perfect year round staple. It excels both on and off the mountain in all conditions. This simple design uses Mons' ultra-lite Merino Air-Con fabric. Nature's climate control - It keeps you cool when you're hot, warm when its not. Pack less. Do more.
name: Mons Royale Icon SS - Brand Lock Up - Mens

specs.value: Merino Air-Con - 83% Merino Wool, 13% Nylon, 4% Elastane
